text: jab kabhee unapar yaatana aa padatee, kahate hai, "ai moosa, hamaare lie apane rab se praarthana karo, us pratigya ke aadhaar par jo usane tumase kar rakhee hai. tumane yadi hamapar se yah yaatana hata dee, to ham avashy hee tumapar eemaan le aaenge aur isaraeel kee santaan ko tumhaare saath jaane denge.
